content:
Hi all,

Is there an easy way of implementing SMART functionality on top of Spring Boot iDP based on MITREid Connect (something like https://github.com/autentia/openid-connect-server-spring-boot)? If there is no easy way, is there a recommended best practice?

I know the SMART "reference implementation builds on MITREid Connect.

Asking for a friend. Really. :)

Not what you asked, but since you mentioned it...

I know the SMART "reference implementation builds on MITREid Connect.

We haven't kept our MITREid-based reference implementation up to date; our current reference implementation is https://launch.smarthealthit.org (source at https://github.com/smart-on-fhir/smart-launcher)
Right, thanks for the clarification on that too.
